text: @ChrissieEvert From @realDonaldTrump "the problem goes away in April" & predicting "packed churches" on Easter Sun to @VP’s claim "by Memorial Day weekend we will have coronavirus epidemic behind us" to Jared Kushner's saying the country would be “really rocking again" by July.  #Happy4thofJuly
